data.title: BORYS GRINCHENKO IN THE EUROPEAN SOCIO-CULTURAL SPACE
data.meta_description: In the article is highlighted the views of a famous Ukrainian writer, social and political figure, educator and humanitarian scientist Borys Grinchenko (1863–1910) concerning the problem of the modern Ukrainian nation civilization choice and its place in the European socio-cultural space. It is determined his main contacts with the European sciences and artists (especially in the spheres of publishing, linguistic, Ukrainian history and culture, problems of the national development of Ukrainians, their pres…
data.text: Number of works in the list of references 22
